content: I'm thinking we can use half of next Wednesday's SMART V2 Argonaut call for Jan Connectathon prep/intro. Let me know if you have any concerns with this plan!

OK, we'll do a track orientation for the first 30min of our call at https://meet.jit.si/argo2020.granular, 2p ET Wednesday! I've updated the Confluence page for our Jan connectathon track to note this.
Hey Josh, your chat here says 3 PM ET but the wiki says 2 PM ET :)
Thanks @Max Philips -- it's 2p ET. I have corrected my message here.
